TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed GlyphFontSizingType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies when the visual style selects a different glyph font size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GlyphFontSizingType> values represent the return values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method when it is called with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GlyphFontSizingType Dpi = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Glyph font size changes are based on dots per inch (DPI) settings.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GlyphFontSizingType None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Glyph font sizes do not change.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GlyphFontSizingType Size = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Glyph font size changes are based on font size settings.
